name: filer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who sends documents to an official authority, especially a tax authority, giving information or making a request: tax filer Payments will be processed automatically for all tax filers. Each filer should get a letter in July stating the amount of the rebate.bankruptcy filer It can take years for a bankruptcy filer to build up their credit again. Related word
file
More examplesFewer examplesWill you be among the many last minute filers racing to the mailbox tonight with a tax return in hand?The amendment would cap the home equity a bankruptcy filer could keep at $125,000.

Add to word list
a person who is dealing with an official authority, especially a tax authority: bankruptcy/tax filer Bankruptcy filers will have a difficult time borrowing money in the future.
